amendatorysection.chaptername: Monopolies and Unlawful Restraint of Trade
amendatorysection.catchline: Disclosure document; disclose period of time plan sold or offered.
amendatorysection.para: The disclosure document required by section 59-1732 shall contain the length of time the seller of the plan has sold seller-assisted marketing plans, and the length of time the seller has sold the specific seller-assisted marketing plan being offered to the purchaser.
